Burning this game with iXtreme Burner MAX and flashing your drive with the latest firmware from http://c4evaspeaks.com/ is the only way you can play this game without getting banned if you are on a system without a chip/vanilla nand. For those of you (like myself) who like to play games early, consider looking into the "reset glitch hack."
